definitions.text: a commercially prepared mixture of dry ingredients
an event that combines things in a mixture

examples: paste made by a mix of flour and water
the mixing of sound channels in the recording studio

definitions.text: open (a place) to members of all races and ethnic groups
add as an additional element or part
to bring or combine together or with something else
examples: resourcefully he mingled music and dance

definitions.text: mix so as to make a random order or arrangement
